Hero style one

Hero Style 2

H2 All-caps Futura Bold 20px/28px centered #f16421

H3 Futura Bold 20px/28px left-aligned #2b2c30

Body copy is set in Helvetica Neue 16px / 24px left-aligned color #666666. Primary inline links are set in #f16421. Not sure we need to have an example of a secondary inline link on the website, but on the blog we use them for the author links. Secondary inline links are set in #0a506c.

Body copy is set in Helvetica Neue 16px / 24px left-aligned color #666666. Primary inline links are set in #f16421. Not sure we need to have an example of a secondary inline link on the website, but on the blog we use them for the author links. Secondary inline links are set in #0a506c.
